```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(shiny)

is.init <- reactiveVal(F)

db <- reactiveFileReader(10000, session, 'db.rds', function(x) {
  readRDS(x)
})

# Persistent database for utilization and dates
observe({
  users <- c('ben', 'chris', 'daniel', 'derek', 'dien', 'henrique', 'john')
  for (i in 1:length(users)) {
    updateDateInput(session, paste0('ds', users[i]), value=db()$date_start[i])
    updateSliderInput(session, paste0('s', users[i]), value=db()$sliders[i])
    updateDateInput(session, paste0('de', users[i]), value=db()$date_end[i])
  }
  is.init(T)
})

observe({
  if (is.init()) {
    date_start = c(input$dsben, input$dschris, input$dsdaniel, input$dsderek, input$dsdien, input$dshenrique, input$dsjohn)
    date_end = c(input$deben, input$dechris, input$dedaniel, input$dederek, input$dedien, input$dehenrique, input$dejohn)
    sliders = c(input$sben, input$schris, input$sdaniel, input$sderek, input$sdien, input$shenrique, input$sjohn)
    saveRDS(data.frame(date_start = date_start, date_end = date_end, sliders = sliders), 'db.rds')
  }
})
```

### Total node allocation

```{r}
renderValueBox({
  sliders = c(input$sben, input$schris, input$sdaniel, input$sderek, input$sdien, input$shenrique, input$sjohn)
  total <- sum(sliders)
  color <- if (total <= 10) { 'success'
  } else if (total > 10 && total <= 14) { 'warning'
  } else 'danger'
  valueBox(total, color = color, icon = 'fa-refresh fa-spin')
})
```

### Nodes idle

```{r}
renderValueBox({
  sliders = c(input$sben, input$schris, input$sdaniel, input$sderek, input$sdien, input$shenrique, input$sjohn)
  total <- sum(sliders)
  avail <- 15 - total
  color <- if (avail < 1) { 'danger'
  } else if (avail >= 1 && avail <= 4) { 'warning'
  } else 'success'
  icon <- if (avail < 1) { 'fa-ban'
  } else if (avail >= 1 && avail <= 4) { 'fa-thumbs-up'
  } else 'fa-thumbs-up'
  valueBox(avail, color = color, icon = icon)
})
```

### More noads available

```{r}
renderValueBox({
  dates = c(input$deben, input$dechris, input$dedaniel, input$dederek, input$dedien, input$dehenrique, input$dejohn)
  dates = dates[dates > Sys.Date()]
  if (length(dates) < 1) {
    closestDate <- 'Now'
  } else {
    closestDate <- min(dates)
    nday <- closestDate - Sys.Date()
    closestDate <- format(closestDate, '%m/%d')
  }
  valueBox(closestDate, color = 'info', icon = 'fa-calendar')
})
```
